title: Hope Street (TEFC)
creator_credit: Ivan Hexter and East West Films
brief_description: Homelessness is a major dilemma for many young Australians. Through the experiences of several young characters living in a refuge, caravan park and squat, Hope Street explores the reasons for their homelessness, the impact it has on their lives and the ways in which these young people endeavour to resolve their predicaments.
